Re Assignment of ETA Cc HPL EOL contracts I added the information recited below concerning the ETA to the Core Main comments for contract I have not seen any assignment information pertaining to this contract therefore the contract will remain in the US Gas name for the present time Tana if you have any asset assignment paperwork please forward copies to Marilyn Colbert Debra Perlingiere and me so that we can process the information appropriately within each group aa From Karen Lambert on PM To Kim S CT Matthew CT Amelia CT Anthony CT Lynn E CT Enron Europe Global Contracts and Facilities Dianne CT Cyndie Balfour NRON cc Rhonda L CT Melissa Ann CT Bhautik CT Stacey CT Linda K CT Chris CT Peggy CT Corey NRON Cheryl CT Linda S CT Sylvia A CT Subject Assignment of ETA FYI NO ACTION NEEDED Forwarded by Karen LambertHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Tana Jones AM To Frank L CT David nron Tom CT Karen CT cc Subject Assignment of ETA Effective March Aquila Energy acquired the assets of USGT US Gas Transportation Inc with the acquiring entity being USGTAquila LP USGT has assigned the Electronic Trading Agreement it executed with ENA to USGTAquila LP A copy of the assignment will be forwarded to Frank Davis

Re IT Contract Cc checked Unify Service Verifications and there is no activity on this contract I also checked with the File Room for documents because there is a reference in the Core Main comments section of the Global record referring to an unexecuted amendment that extended the primary term and added evergreen language There is no record of documents reaching the File Room aa To Amelia CT cc Subject IT Contract Amelia Can you check on contract to see if this is any current transport activity on this contract This contract was never executed Reliant HLP informed me that this contract is no longer being used and they would prefer to terminate or void this contract
